settings.subtitle: SUSTAINABILITY
settings.title: ORGANIC COTTON FARMING
settings.text:
Through organic cotton farming, the land is treated to remove any toxins and sufficient time is given to cleanse the land. Fertilizers and pesticides are not used and the cotton plants are not genetically modified.

The process reduces pollution and water contamination.

All of our ski suits, jackets and pants are made with 75% recycled polyester made from plastic bottles.

Even our new swim wear range is made from recycled polyester.

We visited the factories and saw this process from the beginning which we found mind-blowing. And we bet you're also questioning how plastic bottles become ski suits?

Find out more below.

settings.subtitle: F*CK PLASTIC
settings.title: BIODEGRADABLE PACKAGING
settings.text: The less plastic produced and used around the world, the better. If you purchase our products, you'll find the packaging used to contain your goods is completely biodegradable.

settings.subtitle: TREE PLANTING
settings.title: CARBON OFFSETTING
settings.text: We ship products all over the globe, which in turn gives us a carbon footprint. In order to offset that CO2, we work with our staff to go and plant trees once a quarter, meaning we give back more to the planet more than we take.
Keep an eye on this page for future updates to our sustainability initiatives. If you have any questions about any of the above, feel free to drop us an email.
